pcepkg.avl

Class AVLTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcepkg.avl.AVLTree<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<E>, java.util.Collection<E>, java.util.Set<E>

    public class AVLTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Set<E>
    A binary search tree that contains no duplicate elements and maintains even balance by rotating tree nodes as the tree changes size.
